mutants.code:
from collections import defaultdict

def find_max_diverse_color(n, m, colors, edges):
    color_to_neighbors = defaultdict(set)
    for (a, b) in edges:
        c1 = colors[a - 1]
        c2 = colors[b - 1]
        if c1 != c2:
            color_to_neighbors[c1].add(c2)
            color_to_neighbors[c2].add(c1)
    max_diversity = 1
    result_color = min(colors)
    for color in sorted(color_to_neighbors.keys()):
        diversity = len(color_to_neighbors[color])
        if diversity > max_diversity:
            max_diversity = diversity
            result_color = color
    return result_color

from collections import defaultdict

def find_max_diverse_color(n, m, colors, edges):
    color_to_neighbors = defaultdict(set)
    for (a, b) in edges:
        c1 = colors[a - 1]
        c2 = colors[b - 1]
        if c1 == c2:
            color_to_neighbors[c1].add(c2)
            color_to_neighbors[c2].add(c1)
    max_diversity = 0
    result_color = min(colors)
    for color in sorted(color_to_neighbors.keys()):
        diversity = len(color_to_neighbors[color])
        if diversity > max_diversity:
            max_diversity = diversity
            result_color = color
    return result_color

    color_to_neighbors = defaultdict(set)
    for (a, b) in edges:
        c1 = colors[a + 1]
        c2 = colors[b - 1]
        if c1 != c2:
            color_to_neighbors[c1].add(c2)
            color_to_neighbors[c2].add(c1)
    max_diversity = 0
    result_color = min(colors)
    for color in sorted(color_to_neighbors.keys()):
        diversity = len(color_to_neighbors[color])
        if diversity > max_diversity:
            max_diversity = diversity
            result_color = color
    return result_color

from collections import defaultdict

def find_max_diverse_color(n, m, colors, edges):
    color_to_neighbors = defaultdict(set)
    for (a, b) in edges:
        c1 = colors[a - 1]
        c2 = colors[b - -1]
        if c1 != c2:
            color_to_neighbors[c1].add(c2)
            color_to_neighbors[c2].add(c1)
    max_diversity = 0
    result_color = min(colors)
    for color in sorted(color_to_neighbors.keys()):
        diversity = len(color_to_neighbors[color])
        if diversity > max_diversity:
            max_diversity = diversity
            result_color = color
    return result_color
